name: Shell Life
description:
CONTROLS: gamepad (tested with xbox one) OR keyboard arrows + space + L_alt + L_ctrl

Metroidvania style gameplay in retro sci-fi bioengineered world! We hope you'll like it! :)

Created for Metroidvania Month 8

Soundtrack - "Bisamratta - Manetar", by CC3 (source), Soundeffects from freesound.org

Authors: Ignat Negrey, Vasya Klimashin, Lena Filatova, Vlad Shianov and Lina Filikova
